content: यजमान {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [यज्-शानच्] Sacrificing, worshipping. --नः {@--1@} A person who performs a regular sacrifice and pays its expenses; <ls>R. 18. 12.</ls> {@--2@} A person who employs a priest or priests to sacrifice for him. {@--3@} (Hence) A host, patron, rich man. {@--4@} The head of a family. {@--5@} The head of a tribe.
